name: Marshall Court (1824-1826)
notes: The 1994 Compendium (p.304) claims that Thompson took the oath on Feb 10, 1824, but other sources say Sep 1, 1823.

name: Marshall Court (1835)
reason: Gabriel Duvall Resigned, James M. Wayne Joined

name: Waite Court (1881)
notes: If Matthews didn't take the oath until May 17, 1881, why does this court start on May 5, 1881?

name: White Court (1911)
reason: Willis Van Devanter Joined, Joseph R. Lamar Joined

name: White Court (1916)
reason: Charles E. Hughes Resigned, Joseph R. Lamar Died

name: White Court (1916-1921)
reason: Louis D. Brandeis Joined, John H. Clarke Joined
notes: Brandeis supposedly took the oath on Jun 5, 1916, but an earlier court was not created to reflect that.

name: Warren Court (1956-1957)
reason: Sherman Minton Retired, William J. Brennan, Jr. Joined

name: Warren Court (1958-1962)
reason: Harold Burton Retired, Potter Stewart Joined

name: Burger Court (1969-1970)
reason: Earl Warren Retired, Abe Fortas Resigned, Warren E. Burger Joined

name: Burger Court (1971-1972)
reason: Hugo L. Black Retired, John M. Harlan (II) Retired

name: Burger Court (1972-1975)
reason: Lewis F. Powell, Jr. Joined, William H. Rehnquist Joined

name: Rehnquist Court (1986-1987)
reason: Warren E. Burger Retired, William H. Rehnquist Promoted, Antonin Scalia Joined

name: Rehnquist Court (1994-2005)
reason: Harry A. Blackmun Retired, Stephen G. Breyer Joined

name: Roberts Court (2006-2009)
reason: Sandra Day O'Connor Retired, Samuel A. Alito, Jr. Joined
